title: Sensproducts Showroom
content: Energy systems around the world are undergoing fundamental changes - the balance between fossil fuels and renewable energy sources is shifting toward a decarbonized portfolio. Digitalization is helping us manage the increasing complexity of transmission grids by connecting digital assets.
Find out how Siemens Energy’s Sensproducts, Sensformer and Sensgear, increase operational value by delivering the highest availability and efficiency, as well as, lowest fault risk.
